Posts.Content: My friend is a   a 48 year old woman diagnosed in Sept./08 with breast cancer metasasized to the bone.  Chemotheraphy did not work and      she is on Femara - scored8 out of 8 to respond well to this drug.  Was told had 1-2 years on average to live.  Just wondering if anyone out there has had the same experience, and if so, what were the results.  Looking for positive responses.
Posts.Title: breastcancermetasasizedtobone
